subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|心|alt1=忄|t1=heart|曼|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – a character trait or behavior (of the heart), sluggish. Note that {{lang|zh|曼}} also means “long, extended”, so connotations of “take a long time, leisurely, sluggish”.
